label: SQL Injection Entry Points
query: site:{input} inurl:"id=" OR inurl:"pid=" OR inurl:"category="
description: Find potential SQL injection vulnerable URLs

label: Open Redirects
query: site:{input} inurl:redir OR inurl:redirect OR inurl:return OR inurl:url=http

label: Error Messages
query: site:{input} intext:"syntax error" OR intext:"mysql_fetch" OR intext:"Warning:"
description: Find pages with error messages exposing info

label: Backup and Old Files
query: site:{input} ext:bak OR ext:old OR ext:backup OR ext:~

label: Default Pages
query: site:{input} intitle:"Welcome to" OR intitle:"Apache" OR intitle:"IIS"
